'''
 This script is used to create the new credential recovery
 Proxy : Manager proxy role is required to make possible for 
 anonymous to create a new Credential Recovery
 '''
 
 person_module = context.getDefaultModule('Person')
 result = person_module.searchFolder(reference=reference)
 if len(result) != 1:
 portal_status_message = context.Base_translateString("Can't find corresponding person, it's not possible to update your credentials.")
 return context.Base_redirect('', keep_items = dict(portal_status_message=portal_status_message ))
 
 person = result[0].getObject()
 # create the credential recovery
 module = context.getDefaultModule(portal_type='Credential Recovery')
 credential_recovery = module.newContent(
 		portal_type="Credential Recovery",
 reference=reference,
 default_credential_question_answer=default_credential_question_answer,
 destination_decision=person.getRelativeUrl(),
 language=portal.Localizer.get_selected_language())
 credential_recovery.submit()
 
 portal_status_message = context.Base_translateString("Credential Recovery Created.")
 return context.Base_redirect('login_form', keep_items = dict(portal_status_message=portal_status_message ))
